about_the_game:
Two-axle sliding wall wagon used for the transport of moisture sensitive goods. The package contains the Hbillns 303 in brown livery and DB Cargo colors. Included too is a special version of the Hbillns 303, the Hbillss-y 307. This is a freight wagon with a special bogie for the transport of shock sensitive goods.

The Hbillns 303 Wagon Pack for TS Marketplace features the standard brown, DB Cargo and DB Intetrans liverys and includes the RandomSkin feature which gives realistic variety to your consists when placing the wagons in a scenario.

Features:

  • 3 different liveries Brown Colour, DB Cargo, DB Intertrans
  • Automatic end plates and dynamic numbering
  • All liveries have the RandomSkin feature installed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
